external_games.name: Martian Successor Nadesico: The Blank of 3 Years
Martian Successor Nadesico: The Blank of 3 Years

name: Martian Successor Nadesico: The Blank of 3 Years
summary: Martian Successor Nadesico: The Blank of 3 Years is the second Martian Successor Nadesico game to be released. It is the direct sequel to the TV series, bridging the gap between the events of the final episode and Prince of Darkness.
